title: Conquest of a germ
creator_credit: Gryphon Productions, Donald Taylor and John Eldridge
brief_description: A dramatised tribute to the medical profession and, in particular, to the research workers whose efforts have produced so many valuable drugs and remedies which have revolutionised the treatment of pneumonia, child-birth fever, meningitis, and other diseases. Stars David Farrar.
creator_credit_for_label: Gryphon Productions, Donald Taylor and John Eldridge
